div.p: Codes describing the location of primary or secondary cancer. The value set includes all codes SNOMED-CT body structure hierarchy. The cancer body location code can also come from ICD-O-3 topography codes, however, those codes are not included here due to intellectual property restrictions. Because the value set binding is extensible in the information model, use of ICD-O-3 topography codes conform to mCODE requirements.

description.value: Codes describing the location of primary or secondary cancer. The value set includes all codes SNOMED-CT body structure hierarchy. Because the value set binding is extensible in the information model, use of ICD-O-3 topography codes conform to mCODE requirements.
